rounds.category: OUR STATE LOOKS UP TO YOU
rounds.comments: (Alex: You have to name the state with the longest border to the north of the state we give you.)

clues.text: Kansas looks up to it

Iowans roll their eyes upward at this state
It's Arkansas' good neighbor to the north

rounds.text: Introduced in 1964, he fell out of favor in changing times & in 1970 was marketed as a "Land Adventurer"
